name: Sound Space 3 (CanadianAxe)
description:
A rhythm game where you have to hit circles before it reaches the center. NO CLICKING IS NEEDED. The judgement line is the dark grey circle in the center of the screen. You can only hit the notes when they are in the judgment area. 

Keybinds are: 

Q/E to zoom in and out, 

A/D to increase the song's speed, 

Z/C to change note approach rate, 

S for autoplay,

X/Backspace  for restart/return to song select,

Enjoy!
